Name: Cucumber & Mint Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber and mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A well balanced fortified salad in a glass - almost healthy.
History: Created in 2004 by David Ramos in the Netherlands.
